member.name: T:Syncfusion.JavaScript.CaptchaActionResult
M:Syncfusion.JavaScript.CaptchaActionResult.ExecuteResult(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext)
member.summary: All the values from call back are accessed in this method. All the Operations request performed from here.
member.param: context encapsulates the information about Http Request
member.remarks:
Asyncronous requests from the client side is handled here.
Required operations are performed according to the request.

member.summary: Gets or sets the RefreshCaptchaIamge of the control

member.example:
CaptchaModel model = new CaptchaModel();
model.ShowRefreshButton = true;
